mapper.select: select id, password from uinfo where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into bbs(seqNo, title, content, id) values(#{seqno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{id})
mapper.select: select count(*) as num from bbs
select seqno, title, id from bbs order by seqno desc
select seqno, title, content, id from bbs where seqno = #{seqno}
